testimonials.text: I would like to thank the website 'insurance.emt.com' because of which I could get a good policy.
Thank you for facilitating and following up on the policy. It's been a very pleasurable experience with you folks at EMT Insurance.
Got a good deal without agent calling or speaking to anyone.
I did not even need help from an agent! This is very good!
Thanks for correction done in time and really Appreciated....! GOOD TO HAVE EMT INSURANCE..!! LIFE IS EASY WITH YOU..!!
You are doing a great job. Proud to be a customer of EMT Insurance.
The services provided by EMT Insurance are extremely helpful in making the right choices. Overall I had a good experience with EMT Insurance.
Very simple to use, user-friendly website.
Thanking you very much for your support for getting our policy quickly, I would appreciate your work.

faqs.question: How do I renew my policy?
faqs.answer: You can renew your policy online by logging into your account and selecting the policy you wish to renew.

faqs.question: What documents are required for a claim?
faqs.answer: You will need your policy number, ID proof, and claim form. Additional documents may be required depending on the claim type.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact us via email at support@insurance.emt.com or call our helpline at 1800-123-456.
